directions: Place the onion in a medium bowl, cover with water, and stir in sea salt. Soak for 30 minutes; drain well for 10 minutes.
Stir the drained onion, tomatoes, cucumber, cilantro, jalapeno, and avocado together in a large bowl. Squeeze lime juice over the salad to taste and season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: ½ medium cucumber, peeled and diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Kachumbari
